title: Welcome to Your CELPIP Journey - 3 Month Path
content:
Welcome to your intensive CELPIP preparation course! This 3-month program is designed for motivated learners who want to achieve their target score quickly. You'll practice all four skills daily with challenging exercises.

Canada welcomes over 400,000 new immigrants each year. The CELPIP test helps assess your English abilities for immigration, citizenship, and professional designation. Success requires dedication, consistent practice, and familiarity with Canadian culture.

In this intensive program, you'll complete 2-3 exercises per skill each day. The pace is fast but rewarding. Remember: practice makes perfect!

keyVocabulary.definition: having a strong desire to succeed
commitment to a task or purpose

comprehensionQuestions.question: How many immigrants does Canada welcome each year?
How many exercises per skill will you complete daily in the 3-month program?

learningObjectives: Identify key vocabulary for immigration topics

comprehension.target: Can understand detailed text on subjects related to their interests

vocabulary.target: Has enough vocabulary to express themselves with circumlocutions

inference.target: Can identify main ideas and supporting details

title: Welcome to Your CELPIP Journey - 6 Month Path
content:
Welcome to your CELPIP preparation course! This 6-month program offers a balanced approach to language learning. You'll build skills gradually while maintaining a manageable study schedule.

The CELPIP test evaluates your English proficiency in real Canadian situations. You'll encounter scenarios from workplace conversations to community interactions. This test reflects the English you'll actually use in Canada.

Your 6-month journey includes 1-2 exercises per skill daily. This steady pace allows for deeper learning and retention. Take your time to master each concept.

comprehensionQuestions.question: How does this program describe its approach to learning?
What does CELPIP evaluate?
comprehensionQuestions.correct_answer: English proficiency in real Canadian situations

comprehension.target: Can understand straightforward texts on familiar topics

vocabulary.target: Has sufficient vocabulary for everyday topics

inference.target: Can identify main ideas in clear, standard texts

title: Bienvenue dans votre parcours TEF - 3 mois
content:
Bienvenue dans votre cours intensif de préparation au TEF ! Ce programme de 3 mois est conçu pour les apprenants motivés qui souhaitent atteindre leur score cible rapidement.

Le Canada accueille plus de 400 000 nouveaux immigrants chaque année. Le test TEF évalue vos compétences en français pour l'immigration, la citoyenneté et la reconnaissance professionnelle.

Dans ce programme intensif, vous compléterez 2-3 exercices par compétence chaque jour. Le rythme est soutenu mais gratifiant. Rappelez-vous : c'est en pratiquant qu'on devient parfait !

keyVocabulary.definition: ayant un fort désir de réussir

comprehensionQuestions.question: Combien d'immigrants le Canada accueille-t-il chaque année ?
Combien d'exercices par compétence complèterez-vous quotidiennement ?

learningObjectives: Comprendre la structure du programme de 3 mois
Identifier le vocabulaire clé pour l'immigration

comprehension.target: Peut comprendre un texte détaillé sur des sujets relatifs à ses intérêts

vocabulary.target: Possède un vocabulaire suffisant pour s'exprimer avec quelques périphrases

inference.target: Peut identifier les idées principales et les détails de soutien
